title: Putin's Managed Oligarchy System Development (1999-2008)
description: Investigate Putin's solution to American corporate capture weakness through subordinating wealth accumulation to political control
source_document: The Capture Cascade - Part 3: The Weaponization.pdf
research_notes: Generated from systematic analysis of Putin's weaponization of American institutional capture techniques. Focus on specific dates, personnel connections, and methodological innovations that improved upon American models.
research_areas: System design permitting extreme wealth but prohibiting political independence
Protection and profit opportunities for loyal oligarchs vs persecution for challengers
Legal persecution, asset seizure, and physical elimination of defiant oligarchs
Contrast with American model where corporate elites could act independently of political leadership
